setActor.name: Set Token as Persistent
setActor.hint: Set the selected token as persistent actor.

toggle.name: Toggle Combat Tracker
toggle.hint: Will display a different set of icons to interact with the combatants in the tracker.

status.name: Health Status
status.hint: Comma separated strings representing the different divisions of a creature's health state from worst to best. Leave empty to disable.
status.default: Dead, At Death's Door, Not Feeling Good, Seen Better Days, Barely Hurt, Perfectly Fine

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: A tooltip will be displayed when hovering over tokens on the board.

type.name: Extended Tooltip
type.hint: If/when the extended version of the tooltip should be used.

delay.name: Tooltip Delay
delay.hint: Delay in milliseconds before the tooltip shows up on screen.

position.name: Position
position.hint: Select a preferred side for the tooltip to be displayed, if not possible, the module will try first on the opposite side, otherwise on one of the remaining two.

showDistance.name: Display Distance
showDistance.hint: Will display the distance between the hovered token and one that is inferred automatically.

drawDistance.name: Draw Distance
drawDistance.hint: Draw a line of this thickness between the hovered token and the 'distance' target.

noDead.name: Dead Actor
noDead.hint: What type of tooltip should be displayed when hovering over a dead actor.

modifiers.name: Show Modifiers
modifiers.hint: Should modifiers be displayed instead of DCs in the tooltip.

enabled.name: Enabled (Requires Reload)
enabled.hint: An HUD will be displayed around the currently selected token. It defaults to the User Character if one exist.

scaleDimensions.name: Scale With Token
scaleDimensions.hint: Should the HUD have its dimensions scaled with the token it is attached to.

fontSize.name: Font Size
fontSize.hint: Font size for the Token HUD.

sidebarFontSize.name: Sidebars Font Size
sidebarFontSize.hint: Font size for the Token HUD sidebars.

mode.name: Display Mode
mode.hint: Select the mode of display of the token HUD.

modifiers.name: Show Modifiers
modifiers.hint: Should modifiers be displayed instead of DCs in the token HUD.

highestSpeed.name: Highest Speed
highestSpeed.hint: If no speed was manually selected, the highest one will always be shown by default even if the land speed isn't 0.

sidebarHeight.name: Sidebars Max Height
sidebarHeight.hint: Sets the sidebars max height as a percentage of the viewport.

multiColumns.name: Multi Columns Sidebars
multiColumns.hint: When a sidebar's height is bigger than its max-height, it will be split into 2 or 3 columns.

closeOnSpell.name: Close on Spell Cast
closeOnSpell.hint: Should the HUD/sidebar be closed when casting a spell.

closeOnSendToChat.name: Close on Send to Chat
closeOnSendToChat.hint: Should the HUD/sidebar be closed when sending an item to chat.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: A persistent HUD will be displayed at the bottom of the screen.

modifiers.name: Show Modifiers
modifiers.hint: Should modifiers be displayed instead of DCs in the persistent HUD.

highestSpeed.name: Highest Speed
highestSpeed.hint: If no speed was manually selected, the highest one will always be shown by default even if the land speed isn't 0.

started.name: Only When Started
started.hint: The tracker will only show up for players if the combat has actually started (on top of needing a combatant participating).

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: A combat tracker will show up whenever an owned actor is part of the current encounter.

fontSize.name: Font Size
fontSize.hint: Font size for the Combat Tracker.

textureScaling.name: Texture Scaling
textureScaling.hint: Inverts scale the combatant's image based on the token texture scaling.

error.selectOne: Select a single NPC/Character token to set as your persistent actor.

menu.setActor: Set selected token as persistent actor

clean.hover: Only show UI when hovering the portrait
